markdownRemark.html:
NDArray

Nth dimensional array

Frameworks

Tensorflow

Tensorflow is to be coded in a declarative fashion. Good for perceptrons, FFNN (Feed forward neural network) and other static computation graphs. Which is not good for RNNs (Recurrent Neural Network) as well as for GANNs (Generative Adversarial Neural Networks)

PyTorch

PyTorch is to be coded in a imperative fashion.
